column2: RT @DFSJames: At this time, residents within the boundaries of the District of Fort St James are under an Evacuation Alert, NOT an Evacuati…
column3: At this time, residents within the boundaries of the District of Fort St James are under an Evacuation Alert, NOT an Evacuation Order. Self evacuees are responsible for their own travel and housing arrangements, and are recommended to register with local ESS before leaving. #FSJ

column3: (2) We avoided flooded areas by passing thru commonwealth litex. This route is recommended if you are planning to visit Burgos Elementary school evacuation center rin. Thank you and stay safe!

column2: RT @akurjata: A report on last year's wildfires commissioned by the province noted the stress that evacuation orders can cause and recommen…
column3: A report on last year's wildfires commissioned by the province noted the stress that evacuation orders can cause and recommended a streamlined system for putting them in place, as well as for allowing people into evacuation zones. Right now it's up to local government to handle https://t.co/MIdvdmAPGB

column2: @nathanrt @nic0lix Legally a weekly test and an annual evacuation are the minimum legal requirements, but more frequent evacuation drills are recommended if there's high staff turnover or shift workers etc.
